title: Aapka Intelligent Investment Shield
subtitle: Suspicious content ko instant analyse karein, ya hamare AI se investment concepts explain karayein.

stockMarketCourse.title: Stock Market Course
stockMarketCourse.description: Hamare comprehensive, easy-to-understand course se stock market ke fundamentals seekhein.

investmentQuiz.title: Apna Investment Knowledge Test Karein
investmentQuiz.description: Apna investment knowledge aur fraud protection awareness assess karne ke liye hamari comprehensive quiz lein.

about.title: Get Clarity Finance ke Baare Mein
about.description: Yeh tool ek AI-powered shield hai jo aapko potential securities fraud detect karne mein help karta hai. Yeh financial advisor nahi hai. Hamesha apni research karein (DYOR).

analyzer.placeholder: Suspicious content paste karein ya sawaal poochein, jaise, 'Mutual fund kya hai?'

error.noContent: Analyse karne ke liye content provide karein.
error.connectionFailed: Analysis service se connect nahi ho pa raha hai.
